thread.section_title: Kiwi Sheepskins Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Sheepskins | kiwisheepskins.com
thread.title: Lisa

author: Lisa
title: Lisa
text:
First of all, I want to say that the Bowron medical sheepskins are very high quality. I tried ordering from a different company for a slightly lower price and ended up returning it. The fleece was thin and could not offer the support I needed.
I have since ordered two Bowron medical fleeces from Kiwi Sheepskins. One has had no problems. One has issues with becoming quickly compacted under my hips. I contacted Kiwi Sheepskins hoping they might have a fix for this as I was having to brush it out every two or three days. Way too much upkeep.
The response was amazing. After sending photos of the sheepskin, they have offered to send me a replacement sheepskin at no additional cost. Kiwi Sheepskins really stands behind their products. I am a customer for life.
